definition: to express gratitude (esp. in public)/vote of thanks
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: Special Thanks for the Organizer provide match result.
sentences.chinese: 特别鸣谢主辨机构提供比赛赛果。

sentences.english: Special thanks for the Referees provide match result.
sentences.chinese: 特别鸣谢裁判组提供赛果。

sentences.english: Special thanks for the Organizer provide match results.
sentences.chinese: 特别鸣谢主辨单位提供比赛结果。

sentences.english: Acknowledgements and corrections are the more visible aspects of defusing a public relations problem.
sentences.chinese: 鸣谢和惩戒是更明显的缓解方面的公共关系问题。

sentences.english: Special thanks to Xin Qunying Opera Troupe allowing photo-taking at the backstage.
sentences.chinese: 特别鸣谢新群英剧团容许在后台拍照。

sentences.english: Thank you for referee team provide match results.
sentences.chinese: 鸣谢裁判组提供比赛结果。

sentences.english: Each write-up is courtesy of the student named, and used with permission.
sentences.chinese: 本课程获有关学生许可引用有关评论，特此鸣谢。

sentences.english: Special Thanks for the Organizer provide information.
sentences.chinese: 特别鸣谢主辨机构提供资料。

sentences.english: I wish to acknowledge your assistance in the making of this film.
sentences.chinese: 我希望鸣谢你在拍摄这部电影中给予的帮助。

sentences.english: Special thanks for the Organizer provides match results.
sentences.chinese: 特别鸣谢主辨单位提供比赛结果。

sentences.english: He is one of the few people acknowledged by Capote at the start of the book.
sentences.chinese: 他是卡波特在书的开篇少数鸣谢的人之一。

sentences.english: Thank you South Ho for lending me his everyday tool-of-trade.
sentences.chinese: 鸣谢阿南谢出他的揾食工具。

sentences.english: Special Thanks for the Organizer provide match schedule.
sentences.chinese: 特别鸣谢主辨机构提供比赛赛程。

sentences.english: Our thanks today to NOAA Pacific Services Center.
sentences.chinese: 谨此大力鸣谢NOAA太平洋地区服务中心。

sentences.english: Special thanks to Lee Kum Kee for the recipe.
sentences.chinese: 特别鸣谢李锦记提供本食谱。

sentences.english: The acknowledgment package to individual sponsor will be implemented immediately upon receiving commitment of sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 在接获个别赞助者的承诺后，鸣谢安排立即推展。

definition: expression of gratitude/to give thanks/a thank-you note/acknowledgement
to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
this text/article/the main body of a book
editor in charge (abbr. for 責任編輯|责任编辑[ze2 ren4 bian1 ji2])
specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
